items.sentence: I saw Tom standing over there just a while ago.
You and I should play tennis together sometime.
You can't kill yourself by holding your breath.
We don't have any kids, but we have three dogs.
The dog smelled something and took off running.
How many years has it been since that incident?
I think the president's going to veto the bill.
Tom didn't give me everything that he promised.
I can't help but wonder what's going to happen.
I should've left the camera battery recharging.
I really missed you when you were in Australia.
Tom and Mary played a game of Russian roulette.
Tom's wife is pregnant with their second child.
I have an older brother who lives in Australia.
I heard you were planning to move to Australia.
I never got to do stuff like this in Australia.
I have a younger sister who lives in Australia.
Tom convinced Mary to go to Australia with him.
What does the song of a nightingale sound like?
I hope that this'll be the last time I see you.
I hope that Tom is going to do the right thing.
I hope that Tom did what he was supposed to do.
I hope that Tom isn't the first one to do that.
I hope that Tom is still awake when I get home.
I wish that I'd had the chance to learn French.
I wish that I'd gone to the theater last night.
I wish that I'd eaten lunch before I came here.
Tom stopped Mary before she could say anything.
It's a shame that I'm too young to drive a car.
I'm really happy you could assist us with this.
I don't think the situation will get any worse.
Did you find out when Tom is going to be there?
Every Canadian I've met has been very friendly.
Tom told me he isn't certain what he should do.
Tom knows that he isn't supposed to park there.
Tom knows he isn't supposed to do that anymore.
Tom is going to get killed if he isn't careful.
Did you tell Tom he isn't allowed in this room?
Would you believe me if I told you I loved you?
Tom lives in Boston, and Mary lives in Chicago.
I've got only a week left before school starts.
Tom and Mary walked to the elevator arm in arm.
That would act as a deterrent, don't you think?
I don't know what to give Tom for his birthday.
Tom was surprised that Mary was on John's side.
Tom kept on reading as if nothing had happened.
I want some beautiful flowers put on the table.
I'm not interested in detective stories at all.
I give you my word not to tell anyone about it.
I think I'll stay put in this town for a while.
